titleStmt.title: The soules soliloquie: and, a conference with conscience As it was delivered in a sermon before the King at Newport in the Isle of Wight, on the 25 of October, being the monthly fast, during the late treaty. By the Right Reverend Father in God, Brian Duppa, Ld. Bp. of Salisbury.
titleStmt.author: Duppa, Brian, 1588-1662.

notesStmt.note: Richard Royston was working in London at this time.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
